Reviews.Title: “Tiny rooms but good place all round”
Reviews.Author: Matthew S Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: dont mind tiny mine 7 square metres stay barcelona requested balcony hadnt couldnt stayed shower ive seen inside couldnt left location excellent walk visit neighbourhood plenty bars restaurants shops cleaning staff tell bother day didnt disturbed rest staff helpful breakfast 580 probably deal whats available neighbourhood probably larger mine receptionist basically youre spending day hotel maybe isnt

Reviews.Title: “Great value for the money.”
Reviews.Author: xenagurl
Reviews.Content: nice little hotel centrally located getting easy 20 minutes airport 10 minutes port hotel pre post cruise stays taxi 15 euro port includes entrance exit fee wifi connection front desk staff helpful friendly free access nearby offsite gym didnt safe 20 minute walk las ramblas near stop hoho buses tad noisy neighbors late elevator bit slow im safes functional mine wasnt complain booking future trip theres nice little street pick water bottles cruise choose

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value, well-located hotel in expensive Barcelona”
Reviews.Author: Fifi_banana
Reviews.Content: found hotel chance amazed price past experience hotels expensive barcelona single bathroom compact adequate clean friendly helpful staff free wifi close metro parallel minutes walk la rambla waterfront noisy plumbing reviews noise reduced closing bathroom door night

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel, Super Clean, Great Staff”
Reviews.Author: worldpacer
Reviews.Content: checkin ready bcn 8am hotel clean staff friendly speak english tolerated spanish metro stop parallel short walk 10 minute walk la ramble barrio gotico gladly stay value

Reviews.Title: “Nice Cheap Hotel in Quiet Location”
Reviews.Author: lon1971
Reviews.Content: stayed competing barcelona marathon hotel easy locate nice quiet location 2 minutes walk metro bus stop 15 mins walk ramblas marina etc staff friendly excellent english single compact bed comfi shower hotel slow staying 5th floor quicker walk stairs advice id circumstances pay breakfast basically existant cost 8 euro day booked hotel travel company theres supermarket directly road couple coffee shops nearby overall found excellent stay reasonably priced

Reviews.Title: “Decently priced, good location”
Reviews.Author: Fluorescence
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights september 2010 single 5th floor 1 minute walk parallel metro station catch metro city walk 10 mins easy bus access beach easy access parc je olimpic via funicular parallel station neat clean 24 hr hot water shower bathtub bad elevator slowest ahve seen takes 5 minutes 5 floors dont buy water machine hotel expensive paid 55 euros night booked week coming
